page.title: 08Places of worship.
page.content: There are 3 places of worshisp in our area.Fistiy there is St.Thomas' Church.This was built in 1870.Today the church has 250 members. There are two services every Sunday. Secondly there is Salem Baptist Chapel.This was built in 1877. Today the chapel has 200 members. Baptists believe that you should be baptised when you are confirmed.There are three services every Sunday-a Sermon in the morning and evening and Sunday school in the afternoon. Thirdly there is Bethania. This was built in 1911. Today Bethania has 34 members.There is one service every Sunday. Bethania is a Methodist chapel.
